attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Could the PM please ensure that the webmaster takes full responsibility for the correct running of this website. Here is the response that I received today after trying to sign a number of petitions; Lesley Ann, Please click on the link below to confirm your signature on the petition at the bottom of this email. The petition was created by Miss Tracy Louisa Steel and reads: 'We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to pass a law that prevents the manufacture and use of non-recyclable, packaging and of any packaging that is recyclable but the process of manufacturing is environmentally harmful.' [ Please do not reply to this email, it will not confirm your signature. This email has been automatically sent by the Number 10 petitions system. ] As you will see there is no link to click onto to confirm my signature. Nor is there anyway that I can contact the team to inform them of this hence my 'petition' Kind regards

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
